plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals
маркер множественного числа для местоимений и существительных, относящихся к отдельным лицам

heisig_chinese_memo: Mr. T's house is super secure as he keeps multiple (plural) gates as entry ways.
Ru_trainchinese: men: (графема) используется после местоимений и существительных для обозначения множественного числа
Kanshudo_mnemonic: not just one man (亻) by the gate (門), but several
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mr. T notices that his gate fell off from the strong winds of last night's storm.  'The $@#k!? I don't need no gate!  I need gateS (plural) foo!' he says to himself.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " person " and " door ", it is used as a suffix of words. It is used after the pronouns of person or thing or nouns that refer to people or things to express plural numbers. Tang Liu Zhiji's "Shitong-Miscellaneous": "Qumen, Dixie, Jiang Zuo's speech to each other."

" They " can be used for specific names, indicates that "et al", "generation." "Zhu Zi Yu Lei" Volume One and Three: "Cai Jing has a high number of people, and only one chapter is needed for the management of the Yuan and the party."

" They " are also used in the back demonstrative pronoun, the equivalent of "so", "so" in " it ." "Journey to the West" Chapter 86: "When Zhu Bajie saw it, he cried: "Poor, those masters go in, let these masters come out!""
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " person " and " door ", it is used as a suffix of words. It is used after the pronouns of person or thing or nouns referring to person or thing to express plural.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「門」聲，用作詞的後綴，用在人稱、物稱代詞或指人、指物的名詞後面，表示複數。唐劉知幾《史通‧雜說中》：「渠們、底箇，江左彼此之辭。」

　　「們」可用於具體的人名後，表示「等人」、「之輩」。《朱子語類》卷一三一：「蔡京們著數高，治元祐黨只一章疏便盡行遣了。」

　　「們」還用在指示代詞後面，相當於「這麼」、「那麼」的「麼」。《西游記》第86回：「豬八戒見了就哭道：『可憐啊，那們個師父進去，弄做這們個師父出來也！』」
humanum_short_description: 從「人」，「門」聲，用作詞的後綴，用在人稱、物稱代詞或指人、指物的名詞後面，表示複數。

們們RS
们们 		adjunct pronoun indicate plural
  • many men 亻 waiting at the gate 門
(Simplified: 们)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 門 indicates the sound; 亻 (people) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 門 [ mén ] gate, door, entrance, opening
①加在名詞或代詞後，表示複數：我們。他們。同胞們。
②口語中表示類屬：哥兒們。(名詞前有量詞時，後面不加“們”，如不稱“三個孩子們”)。

Tang Liu Zhiji's "Shitong-Miscellaneous": "Qumen, Dixie, Jiang Zuo's speech to each other." " They" can be used for specific names, indicates that "et al", "generation." "Zhu Zi Yu Lei" Volume One and Three: "Cai Jing has a high number of people, and only one chapter is needed for the management of the Yuan and the party." " They" are also used in the back demonstrative pronoun, the equivalent of "so", "so" in " it." "Journey to the West" Chapter 86: "When Zhu Bajie saw it, he cried: "Poor, those masters go in, let these masters come out!""

們字的基本解释

們
mén
见“们”。

們字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mén］
［《字彙補》莫奔切］
“们1”的繁体字。
(1)词的后缀。用在人称、物称代词或指人、指物的名词后面，表示复数。
(2)词的后缀。用于具体的人名后，表示“等人”、“之辈”。
(3)词的后缀。用在指示代词后面，相当于“这么”、“那么”的“么”。

們字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　們； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页107第26
【集韻】莫困切，音悶。們渾，肥滿貌。　又莫奔切，音門。今塡詞家我們俺們。

們字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
們字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mén］
["Word Huibu" Mo Benqie]
Traditional characters of "人1".
(1) The suffix of the word. It is used after the pronouns of person or thing or nouns referring to person or thing to indicate the plural.
(2) The suffix of the word. After being used for a specific name, it means "waiting people" and "generations".
(3) The suffix of the word. Used after demonstrative pronouns, it is equivalent to "what" of "so" and "so".
They
